✱  Blood in the vomit, sputum or stools can be due to a serious condition and must be investigated and managed as soon as

✱  Dog bites must be washed with plenty of clean water and soap 
before any other treatment.
✱ The person must be taken to the district hospital as soon as 
possible in case of an accident. 
✱  Blisters should not be burst.
✱  Burns need to be kept cool with cold water or even ice, if available. This prevents further damage to the part and also 
relieves pain.
